description: BR-32 is the District Transport Office for Madhubani, situated in the Mithila region of Bihar. The office oversees vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement for a district famous for its globally recognized Madhubani art and strategic location near the Indo-Nepal border. It serves as a critical transport node within the Darbhanga division, facilitating movement across both rural and urban sectors including major hubs like Jainagar and Jhanjharpur.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Madhubani, Bihar
